title: How to Make Pumpernickel Sourdough Bread

steps.headline: Mix the pumpernickel flour into the starter.
Add half a cup of water and stir in.
steps.description: It is okay to add more water if the mixture feels too thick - do this by feel.

steps.headline: Flour a rolling board.
steps.description: Take the dough and knead it on the board for 5 - 10 minutes. This can be tough on the wrists, so if you have a helper, share the task. The ability to knead dough improves with practice.

steps.headline: Put the dough into a greased bowl.
steps.description: Olive oil makes a good choice for greasing the bowl.

steps.headline: Cover the dough with a damp tea towel or baking paper.
steps.description: Set aside in a warm place and allow to rise. It should double in size before you touch it again.

steps.headline: Punch the doubled dough and add the remaining ingredients - the rest of the flour, the honey, yeast and salt.
steps.description: More water can be added if needed (see "Tips").

steps.headline: Divide the dough into two halves.
steps.description: Place each dough half into greased or lined loaf tins for baking.

text: Mix the pumpernickel flour into the starter.  Add 1 cake of yeast.  Add half a cup of water and stir in. It is okay to add more water if the mixture feels too thick - do this by feel. Flour a rolling board. Take the dough and knead it on the board for 5 - 10 minutes. This can be tough on the wrists, so if you have a helper, share the task. The ability to knead dough improves with practice. Put the dough into a greased bowl. Olive oil makes a good choice for greasing the bowl. Cover the dough with a damp tea towel or baking paper. Set aside in a warm place and allow to rise. It should double in size before you touch it again. Punch the doubled dough and add the remaining ingredients - the rest of the flour, the honey, yeast and salt. More water can be added if needed (see "Tips"). Knead again for 5 - 10 minutes.  Divide the dough into two halves. Place each dough half into greased or lined loaf tins for baking. Bake at 400ºF/250ºC for 35 - 40 minutes.  Finished.
